meanings.definition: The melodious sounds made by birds.
meanings.sent1: I woke up to the sweet birdsongs outside my window.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with the beautiful birdsongs of various species.
meanings.sent3: The birdsongs in the park seemed to be having a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like birdsongs, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The birdsongs echoed through the valley, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The birdsongs in the audio recording were diverse and captivating.
meanings.sent2: The ornithologist studied the birdsongs to identify different species.
meanings.sent3: The birdsongs on the CD helped me relax after a long day.
meanings.sent4: The birdsongs in the forest were like a symphony of nature.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the birdsongs brought a sense of tranquility to my mind.

meanings.definition: The act of singing by birds.
meanings.sent1: The early morning birdsongs signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent2: The birdsongs at dawn were a reminder of the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent3: The birdsongs seemed to be a cheerful greeting to the sunrise.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite part of the day was listening to the birdsongs in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The birdsongs filled the air with a sense of freedom and joy.
